tool_description: Analyzes delivery performance metrics including on-time delivery rates, average transit times, exception rates, and service level compliance.

carrier_codes.description: Array of carrier codes to analyze

service_levels.description: Service levels to include in analysis

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date, and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Empty carrier codes: At least one carrier code must be specified.
Empty service levels: At least one service level must be specified.
Analysis period too long: Maximum analysis period is 365 days.
Insufficient data: Not enough delivery data available for the specified criteria.
usage: Specify analysis period dates, carrier codes, and service levels to analyze delivery performance. Optionally filter by geographic regions for more targeted analysis.

on_time_delivery_rate.description: Percentage of deliveries made on time

average_transit_days.description: Average number of days in transit

service_level_compliance.description: Compliance rates for each service level

trend_analysis.description: Performance trend analysis over the period
